title: [Large-scale] Blended Team Accelerated Teaching-Based E-Learning for Advanced Mathematics Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical logic and foundational computer science concepts
context.additional_context: Practical math proficiency enhancement program for enterprise manager/leader role learners. Emphasizes team-based problem-solving in hybrid (remote/in-person) settings.

learning_goals: Learners improve their logical language proficiency by over 80% in activity theory-based team projects
Learners successfully apply mathematical modeling to computer science application tasks at least three times
Through team interactions, learners can restructure complex mathematical concepts into structured explanations of four or more levels
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
